titles.title: Nuclear Energy Renewal Act of 2019
Nuclear Energy Renewal Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 and the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to support licensing and relicensing of certain nuclear facilities and nuclear energy research, demonstration, and development, and for other purposes.
Nuclear Energy Renewal Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Energy. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 353.

action.text: By Senator Murkowski from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 116-203.
